data.comment: John Brooks starts the match. Bristol City with the kick-off in Bristol.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Birmingham have kicked-off the second half at Ashton Gate.
Maxime Colin (Birmingham) has received a yellow card from John Brooks.
Birmingham's Jon Toral has been booked in Bristol.
In the minute 72, Alen Halilovic is replacing Jon Toral for Birmingham at Ashton Gate.
Dean Holden (Bristol City) is making a first substitution, with Famara Diedhiou replacing Chris Martin.
Dean Holden is making the team's second substitution at Ashton Gate with Jack Hunt replacing Adrian Mariappa.
In the minute 80, Birmingham move into a 0-1 lead through a Harlee Dean header.
The home team replace Tommy Rowe with Jay DaSilva.
Bristol City make their fourth substitution with Sam Bell replacing Adam Nagy.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
